DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the natural course of coronary spasm patients presenting aborted sudden cardiac death and analyze risk factors.
DOC.brief_title: Coronary Spasm Presenting Aborted Sudden Cardiac Death, the Multicenter Registry
DOC.criteria: Age 18 and more Coronary spasm Life expectancy less than 2years Coronary stenosis 50% and more Structural abnormalities of the heart leading to ventricular arrhythmia
